moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5 a6 4. Ba4 Bc5: My usual followup is b5. I decided to try something different.
moves.7... exd4: I trade off my doomed pawn.
moves.8... d5: I am safely up a pawn.
moves.10. Nc3: ? This piece was needed later to attack the knight. Bd2
moves.12... Nxc3: I whip off a second pawn.
moves.15. Qb3 Nxc2 16. Qxc2 Bf5 17. Nxe4 Bxe4: The threat of mate on h7 is gone.
moves.18. Qb3 b6: ? An inaccuracy on my part. My idea was to prepare c5.
moves.19. Bb2 Qg5: The queen mobilizes with a vengeance!
moves.22. Rae1: ?? What made him do that? Now I win without a problem!
moves.22... Be4: !! Mate is inevitable sooner or later!
moves.23. fxe4: ?? A bad error. He resigned as soon as he played it. Mate next move...
moves.23... Qxe1#: White still would have died after Rxe4 dxe4, Rxe4 R(f or a)e8! and white is in big trouble!
